sections.text: Penn GSE’s M.S.Ed. programs prepare educators and leaders to improve learning through research‑based practice in areas such as education policy, higher education, and learning sciences.

items: Program pathways including Education Policy, Higher Education, and Learning Sciences
Foundational coursework in research methods and practice
Fieldwork or internship opportunities depending on track
sections.text: Students select a program area and complete research‑informed coursework with applied experiences aligned to their interests.

items: Completion of required course credits and culminating experiences
For some tracks, practica or internships
sections.text: Admissions and completion requirements vary by M.S.Ed. program; students fulfill credit and practice components per track.
Graduates work in schools, higher education administration, policy organizations, nonprofits, and edtech.
